config: Believe it or not, in addition to reaping beautiful flowers and nutritious harvests for your table, gardening can do wonders for your well-being to make it through these tough times. Roll up your sleeves, start digging, planting, and weeding as a healthy alternative to cope with this "new normal." Find below a list of several of these benefits:
● Gardening burns a lot of calories and can lower your blood pressure.
● Spending time outside is good for your bones.
● Growing your own food can help you eat healthier.
